<image>
I need the written content from this picture converted into text. Can you do that?

al mortal wounds. Over the course of the series Gardner made peace with a great deal of his past. On one Christmas the Spectre on behalf of the Phantom Stranger made it possible for Guy to communicate with his deceased father who apologized for the abuse both physical and mental he placed upon Guy, his brother Blake and their mother. He told Guy how proud he was of all the accomplishments Guy achieved as a man and the pair reconciled. Afterward Guy would give his condolences to Ice's mother over their shared loss of her daughter and she provided him an ice sculpture.
Generate an image according to the following description: A vibrant street with colorful houses and people walking.
Here is an image based on the description: <image>
根据以下描述生成一张图像：一条充满活力的街道，两旁是色彩斑斓的房屋，行人来往穿梭。
这是根据您的描述生成的图像：<image>
<image> Change the rusty frying pan to a steaming pot with water pouring into it.
<image> 把生锈的煎锅换成热气腾腾、正在往里倒水的锅。
